messages.success:
Your stream will be added to the list of livestreams in the sidebar, it will display the next time you are live on twitch.tv.

Problems? [Contact the moderators here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=%2Fr%2F{subreddit})

 Do not reply to this message.
messages.banned:
Sorry, but that stream is banned from this subreddit. If you feel this is an incorrect ban, [please message the moderators here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=%2Fr%2F{subreddit})

 Do not reply to this message.
messages.already_exists:
Your stream is already in the list of livestreams that this bot checks. If you have just messaged your stream, please wait 5-10 minutes for the sidebar to update.

 Problems? Contact the moderators [here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=%2Fr%2F{subreddit})

 Do not reply to this message.
